body:
I think we should have translated version of the code of conduct outside of this repo, the same way translations of the tour are somewhere else.

I'm wondering if this should be part of one of the resources already linked [here](https://github.com/golang/go/wiki/NonEnglish#brazilian-portuguese---portugu%C3%AAs-brasileiro).

Do you have any contacts with the owners of golangbr.org?
